titles: On the most noble James, Earl of Annandale.
author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
notes: Verse - "Reader, behold here lies all Scotland's loss,".
An epitaph, signed: T.S. (i.e., Thomas Shadwell).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Annandale, James Murray, --  Earl of, d. 1658 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
